2022 Organizing Committee





Sponsors

























Co-chairs


Jeongwoo Kang




Jonathan Evertz




Prince Gashongore









It is our great pleasure to warmly invite you to the 2022
International Collaborative Workshop of RUB-UGA-UT, 4th Edition - Recent
Trends in Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence (CollaboTICS
2022) between the University of Grenoble-Alpes, Ruhr-Universität Bochum
and the University of Tsukuba as part of their academic partnership.
Here, we hope to promote the international exchange of expertise even
further as topics of Artificial Intelligence are becoming of high
concern recently. Our vision is that this event will create new research
opportunities, encourage open and independent mindsets, and increase the
scientific network among our working groups.
Prince, Jeongwoo & Jonathan

General Organization

articles.title: CollaboTICS 2022
articles.contents:
CollaboTICS 2022
    
    
      
  Home


  Program


  Registration & Submission


  Committee

      
  
    
     
  


  
    
     
  

      
  






CollaboTICS 2022





Sponsors






















The 2022 International Collaborative Workshop of RUB-UGA-UT, 4th
Edition - Recent Trends in Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence
(CollaboTICS 2022) is a collaborative workshop between the University of
Grenoble-Alpes, Ruhr-Universität Bochum and the University of
Tsukuba.
Our workshop will consist of sessions of oral presentations and
poster presentations. Students, young researchers, and professors from
both universities are welcome to present their current or past research
in our workshop! We hope that through our workshop, students and
professors from both universities can discuss their respective research
topics and find opportunities for future collaborations.

Worshop Implementation
The CollaboTICS 2022 is pleased to announce the full virtual
conference program schedule.


Important Information

Workshop dates
Workshop Dates: 15 December 2022 - 16 December 2022
Time:
Japan time: 4 pm to 9pm.
France and German time: 8 am to 1 pm.

Deadline – General registration will be the 08 December 2022 –
Deadline 13 December 2022


Submission procedures
Deadline — Poster/presentation material will be the 11 December
2022.
If you want to present at our workshop, please fill this form.
For more information see the registration
section.


Using Gather
We will make Gather town available for users to try the platform
before event.

articles.title: Registration & Submission
articles.contents:
CollaboTICS 2022
    
    
      
  Home


  Program


  Registration & Submission


  Committee

      
  
    
     
  


  
    
     
  

      
  






Registration & Submission





Sponsors






















2022 International Collaborative Workshop of RUB-UGA-UT, 3rd Edition
- “Recent Trends in Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence”
(CollaboTICS 2022) is a joint collaboration between the University of
Tsukuba, the University of Grenoble Alpes, and Ruhr University Bochum.
The goal of the workshop is to provide an informal forum for researchers
to discuss emerging research directions in computer science and explore
new collaboration pathways through oral and poster presentations. The
presentations can be on any topic relevant to the computer science
research community of the three universities. We particularly encourage
presentations pertaining to this year’s theme: “Recent Trends in
Computer Science” with a focus on the following topics:
Human-centered AI
Multidisciplinary AI
Machine Learning
Federated / Active Learning
Modelling and Simulation
Signal and Image Processing
Sensors
Evolutionary Algorithms
Optimization
IOT
Data Science
Big Data
Human-Computer Interaction
Robotics
Artificial Life
High Performance Computing
Related applications
To participate or present at our workshop, please fill this form.


Submission Instructions
The workshop will host two types of presentations: Oral Presentations
and Poster Presentations. All submissions will be made through the URL
below. Please follow the link for more details on the submission
guidelines, and be sure to refer to these instructions well before the
deadline. You may submit and update your application online right up
until the deadline.

Important dates
Presenter Registration Deadline: 08 December 2022, 23:59 JST (15:59
CET)
Oral Presentation Submission Deadline: 11 December 2022, 23:59 JST
(15:59 CET)
Poster Presentation Submission Deadline: 11 December 2022, 23:59 JST
(15:59 CET)
Audience Registration Deadline: 13 December 2022, 23:59 JST (15:59
CET)

Oral Presentations
Young researcher / Student oral presentation: 15 minutes + 5
minutes for QA.
Professor oral presentation: 20 minutes + 10 minutes for
Questions and Answers.
All oral presenters should send their presentation slides to CollaboTICS2022@gmail.com
(in PDF format) by 11 December, 23:59 Japan Standard Time (JST) - 11
December, 15:59 Central European Time (CET).
The slides will be made available on the website after the
workshop.



Poster Presentations
Each poster presenter should be at their designated spot on Gather during the time of their poster
session. All poster presenters should send a “poster presentation kit”
by 11 December, 23:59 Japan Standard Time (JST) - 11 December, 15:59
Central European Time (CET).
All oral presenters should send their presentation slides to CollaboTICS2022@gmail.com
(in PDF format) by 11 December, 23:59 Japan Standard Time (JST) - 11
December, 15:59 Central European Time (CET).


This kit includes:
Poster: To be available at the poster session room on Gather.
Landscape orientation;
Size: Widescreen (16:9) Click
here for an example of a poster


Using Gather
We will make Gather town available for users to try the platform
before event.
